item.description:
Join Us ** Petitioning this weekend **

Join Susan and the 9/11 Truthers' Tyranny Response Team this Saturday, June 21 in Newton, at the Whole Foods Market, corner of Beacon and Walnut Street starting at 10:00 a.m.

Thanks to the Tyranny Response of Boston 9/11 Truthers, we now have over 750 signatures.
We still need 2250 more by July 29th, to reach our goal of 3,000 so we must get serious about achieving this goal.

The Susan Allen for U.S. Congress campaign will drive home the need to:
1. Expose the 9-11 Cover-up.
2. Expose Foreign Control of the Federal Reserve.
3. Expose Foreign Takeover of all U.S. Property
4. Expose U.S. Detention Centers built to House Citizens

When Susan is asked to address other issues (such as abortion, environment, healthcare, etc) she will address them in brief terms (1 or two sentences) that are designed to redirect attention back to the above two issues whenever possible.

Everyone helping to collect signatures for Susan Allen's campaign will be encouraged to wear 9-11 gear, hand out 9-11 literature and offer DVDs to voters. (Please keep all DVDs and literature focused on the campaign's two main issues.)

A free "Investigate 9-11" T shirt will be awarded to any/all petitioners who fill up a petition sheet for Susan's campaign. (That's 25 signatures.)

Please contact me if you can join in on the fun. If you need DVDs and/or literature, let us know. With your help, we can put a truly bold 9-11 Truth candidate on the ballot this year!

Please rsvp.
Peace!
Waldo
item.how_to_find_us: Whole Foods Market, corner of Beacon and Walnut Street, Newton

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: Petitioning this weekend for the Susan Allen Congressional Campaign
